name: Kill Mafia
description:
In the 1930's, the discovering of a new source of energy from a mineral called "Neonite" causes an economic rebond in America that makes it the most technologically advanced country in the world however the crime rate remains very high which worries the US government the most following the global crisis. In order to prevent chaos spreading, the justice decides to special agents to dismantle criminal organizations ... from within.

Kill Mafia is a one level twin-stick shooter game where you play as Rose, an agent specializing in the fight against a powerful mafia organization. After being abducted, you grap a weapon and seek revenge by killing all the gangters you meet with no mercy.

Explore the levels, eliminate all those who try to stop you with a variety of guns, seek and destroy the generators to progress and then kill the boss. 

But be careful !! You only have one only life so don't waste it.

You can see the objectives in the pause menu.

TIPS : You can press Esc to also see the controls in the pause menu .
